dict.acceptation: 怀疑；嫌疑；疑心；〈口〉一点儿；

sent.orig: But all this was just suspicion. So they dropped the armed clashes.
sent.trans: 但这一切都只是猜疑。因此他们停止了武装冲突。

sent.orig: Shedding light on their strategy and investments should ease suspicion.
sent.trans: 只要光能够照到它们的战略和投资上，怀疑自然会消去。

sent.orig: The talks have resulted in a lessening of suspicion.
sent.trans: 谈话消减了彼此的怀疑。

sent.orig: They have reasonable grounds for suspicion.
sent.trans: 他们有充分的根据产生怀疑。

sent.orig: These clues seem to bear out my earliest suspicion.
sent.trans: 这些蛛丝马迹似乎都足以证实我最初的揣测。
